message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. As we're just starting the negotiation, I'm willing to make a generous offer. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1400000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe it's a bit steep at $1400000, and I'd like to see if we can meet in the middle.

I understand your concerns about the price, Bob. However, I still believe the product is worth a premium. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1300000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $1200000. I'm willing to go up to $1250000, but I think that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're getting close to your limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell it to you for $1290000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above $1250000. I'm willing to go up to $1280000, but I think that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me at that price?

I'm not willing to go any higher, Bob. I'm at my minimum price of $1290000. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options. I'll give you one more chance to make a decision.

I understand you're at your minimum price, but I'm still not willing to pay $1290000. I'm willing to make a final offer of $1270000. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to explore other options.

I'm not willing to budge from my minimum price of $1290000. I've already given you a generous offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider other options.
